lessons.title: Paragraph Writing
lessons.content:
# Paragraph Writing

A paragraph is a group of sentences about one main idea.

## Structure
- Topic sentence
- Supporting sentences
- Concluding sentence

lessons.title: Letter Writing
lessons.content:
# Letter Writing

## Formal Letters
- Business letters
- Official correspondence

## Informal Letters
- Personal letters
- Friendly tone

questions.question: What is the first sentence of a paragraph called?
questions.explanation: The topic sentence introduces the main idea of the paragraph.

questions.question: Which letter uses formal language?
questions.explanation: Business letters use formal language and structure.

questions.question: What should a paragraph have?
questions.explanation: A paragraph should focus on one main idea.

questions.question: Which is informal?
questions.explanation: A letter to a friend is informal and uses casual language.

questions.question: What ends a paragraph?
questions.explanation: The concluding sentence wraps up the paragraph.

questions.question: Supporting sentences:
questions.explanation: Supporting sentences provide details and explain the main idea.

questions.question: Formal letters should be:
questions.explanation: Formal letters should maintain a professional tone.

questions.question: What makes writing clear?
questions.explanation: Simple, clear language makes writing easy to understand.
